body: I could help with the CSS/setting it all up.
body_tagged: I could help with the CSS/setting it all up.
title: Can we get an Avicus subreddit?

replies.body: There is no point, the sub would die and the forums are easier to use.
replies.body_tagged: There is no point, the sub would die and the forums are easier to use.

replies.body: "Can we get an Avicus subreddit?" Well, we can get an Avicus subreddit... rather, we got one, and it died.
replies.body_tagged: "Can we get an Avicus subreddit?" Well, we can get an Avicus subreddit... rather, we got one, and it died.

replies.body:
We had one. It was like the forums just less strict. Then a senior mod decided to grief it (ban all other moderators, delete all posts, create inappropriate posts everywhere, etc). The senior mod is not a dtaffmember anymore.

Well, I would love if it gets relieved. Maybe as an emergency forum, in case the forums server are down.

I think para (vice) is in charge of it, I'll ask him.

replies.body: can I know who that staff member is? or is that confidential info?
